columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the device. Inherited from directoryObject.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The name displayed for the device.

columns.name: account_enabled
columns.description: True if the account is enabled; otherwise, false.

columns.name: device_id
columns.description: Unique identifier set by Azure Device Registration Service at the time of registration.

columns.name: approximate_last_sign_in_date_time
columns.description: The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.

columns.name: filter
columns.description: Odata query to search for resources.

columns.name: is_compliant
columns.description: True if the device is compliant; otherwise, false.

columns.name: is_managed
columns.description: True if the device is managed; otherwise, false.

columns.name: mdm_app_id
columns.description: Application identifier used to register device into MDM.

columns.name: operating_system
columns.description: The type of operating system on the device.

columns.name: operating_system_version
columns.description: The version of the operating system on the device.

columns.name: profile_type
columns.description: A string value that can be used to classify device types.

columns.name: trust_type
columns.description: Type of trust for the joined device. Possible values: Workplace (indicates bring your own personal devices), AzureAd (Cloud only joined devices), ServerAd (on-premises domain joined devices joined to Azure AD).

columns.name: extension_attributes
columns.description: Contains extension attributes 1-15 for the device. The individual extension attributes are not selectable. These properties are mastered in cloud and can be set during creation or update of a device object in Azure AD.

columns.name: member_of
columns.description: A list the groups and directory roles that the device is a direct member of.
